author: Special Correspondent
text:
R. Jeyanthi is the new Deputy Commissioner of Police (Crime). She assumed office on Friday.

Ms. Jeyanthi, a 1998-batch of Deputy Superintendent of Police, was hitherto Deputy Commissioner of Police (Crime and Traffic) in Tiruchi city police.

She succeeds G. Umayal, who has been transferred as Superintendent of Police (Prohibition Enforcement) in Madurai Zone. Ms. Jeyanthi, who had mostly served in Central Zone, said that her efforts would be towards visible policing in preventing crimes in the city. She said that morning and evening rounds by police officials would be given focus, besides increased patrolling at night.
title: New DC (Crime) assumes office
